item.title: An illustration
item.description: Learning Objectives By the end of this section be able to: Apply the Central Limit Theorem on asample in R, Generate a random sample from a given dataset, Identify if a distribution is skewed or not using a histogram You now know what the Central Limit Theorem is and why it is so important. You â€™ve been recently introduced to RStudio and you are very good at it!
